alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lee; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 2:14AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Owsley, eastern Jackson, northwestern Breathitt, Lee and southern Wolfe Counties through 245 AM EST... At 213 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Zion, or near McKee, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Delvinta, Vincent, Cressmont, Endee and Major around 220 AM EST. Booneville, Pebworth, Ida May, Levi, White Ash, Caryton, Belle Point, Heidelberg, Scoville and Turin around 225 AM EST. Beattyville, Enoch, Lower Buffalo, Corgleton, Grass, Maloney, Proctor, Stay, Lerose and Mount Olive around 230 AM EST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
